titleStmt.title: The Negotiations of the embassadors sent to the Duke of Savoy by the Protestant Swiss-Cantons, in favour of the distressed Vaudois wherein there are many things very curious, and some letters never before published / translated out of French.
titleStmt.author: Boyer, P. (Pierre), 1619-ca. 1700.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Pierre Boyer.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
